title: "Autonomous Luxury Vehicle Market Size Projections Indicate A CAGR Of 32.57%, Envisioned To Attain A Value Of USD 174.57 Billion By 2030"
excerpt: "“According to the latest research study, the global autonomous luxury vehicle market size was valued at about USD 17.83 billion in 2022. The market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 32.57% and is anticipated to reach a value of USD 174.57 billion by 2030.”"
